import React,{useState} from 'react' import './ExpenseForm.css' const ExpenseForm = ()=>{ const [enteredTitle,setEnteredTitle] = useState('Title') // Title 관련 useState const titleChangeHandler = (event)=>{ setEnteredTitle(event.target.value) } // Title 상태 변경 함수 (onChange) return
} export default ExpenseForm
